response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute immensely to your success. This product holds immense value to me, not just financially but also in terms of its impact on your business or personal goals. Given its importance, I understand that the asking price might seem substantial at first glance. However, considering its true worth and the benefits it can bring to you, I am offering you the chance to secure this product at a special introductory price of $950,000.

This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to its market value. My intention is to ensure that you have the opportunity to experience the full potential of this product without any financial barriers. I trust that the value it offers will far outweigh the investment you make today.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am more than happy to discuss further details or answer any questions you might have. I look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to your success.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
